ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: umm i resent that remark. Im subscribed to both the bard and necro mailing list, and well, to make it plain and obvious for you, the bard msg board is way more
ygData.messageBody:
umm i resent that remark. Im subscribed to both the bard and necro mailing
list, and well, to make it plain and obvious for you, the bard msg board is
way more of a whiny tune then the necro one. And I've been a bard way longer
then a necro so dont think im saying this because im a necro. I just find
there's more whining on this board, you wouldnt beleive how many threads
i've deleted sometimes

-Rakka 51 necro
-Minkin 36 bard
Sol Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jay schultze [SMTP:sartori69@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2000 10:12 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
>
> Omg you ppl are starting to sound like the friggin necro community. Would
> you like some cheese with that? I agree there are things that need to be
> fixed that are more important than not writing out the entire name of a
> song
> (I think they need to fix the song/z-axis bug in Sebilis, personally).
> It's
> a high level Brusco's song. How many of those are there? ONE. Deal with
> it.
> Verant has already screwed the pooch on numerous class-related issues. If
> abbreviating their patch messages (to the point where anyone with an
> inkling
> of sense could still easily reason them out) gives them more time to fix
> what needs to be fixed, so be it.
>
> Here's something real you can bitch about - why do people on lists have to
>
> quote the entire friggin patch message in their posts after they find
> something really stupid to complain about? Draelon?
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
> 53rd Original Slimshadeeeeeee, Veeshan
>
